thread.title_full: Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice Plot Details Revealed In New Issue Of Total Film

title: Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice Plot Details Revealed In New Issue Of Total Film
text: Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice Plot Details Revealed In New Issue Of Total Film Reported by Jay Cochran - 2015.10.25 Issue #239 of Total Film features an interview revealing plot details as well as a cool cover with Batman (Ben Affleck), Superman (Henry Cavill) and Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) from the upcoming Warner Bros. Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice movie. Some of the highlights from the interview with the movie cast and crew include revealing that Batman will be a wanted fugitive in this movie and that the opening prologue sequence will feature the climatic battle between Superman and General Zod seen in the last Superman movie through the eyes of Bruce Wayne. This sets the overall tone of the movie which will then jump ahead 18 months. The article also goes on to confirm that actor Jesse Eisenberg who will be playing Lex Luthor in the film did shave his head for the role. Look for issue #239 of Total Film out on stands now.
